about_the_game:
Have you been going to the gym? No? Don't worry! With our friends at Porto Editora, we worked hard to give you a thrilling six-pack! Introducing the all-new Flute Master "Play 6" DLC pack with 6 new tracks for your recorder! Test your skills and become a Master Fluter. Or a Flute Master. Either way, your skills will be awesome!

PS: Please be aware that these melodies can cause permanent loss of bad music taste. Buy at your own risk.


Featuring 6 new tracks:

- Flute Master Rock
- Santa Plays the Flute
- Dragon Pop
- I'm a Man You Don't Meet Every Day
- Master Albert Jazz
- DJ Bat

(You can preview the tracks inside the game itself.)
detailed_description:
Have you been going to the gym? No? Don't worry! With our friends at Porto Editora, we worked hard to give you a thrilling six-pack! Introducing the all-new Flute Master "Play 6" DLC pack with 6 new tracks for your recorder! Test your skills and become a Master Fluter. Or a Flute Master. Either way, your skills will be awesome!

PS: Please be aware that these melodies can cause permanent loss of bad music taste. Buy at your own risk.


Featuring 6 new tracks:

- Flute Master Rock
- Santa Plays the Flute
- Dragon Pop
- I'm a Man You Don't Meet Every Day
- Master Albert Jazz
- DJ Bat

(You can preview the tracks inside the game itself.)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 onwards
  • Processor: Single core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a recorder (flute) and a microphone to play!

name: Flute Master - Play 6

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 onwards
  • Processor: Single core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need a recorder (flute) and a microphone to play!

short_description: The "Play 6" DLC pack features 6 new original songs made by Porto Editora especially for Flute Master! Watch out for that 6-pack.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
